reviews.review_msg: Great, prof that uses real world examples to keep lecture interesting. Weekly quizes but they are manageable and keep you on top of material.

Great prof because he only has one midterm and the remaining of your grade comes from group projects and participation. Slide materials are basically all you need to study. He marks easy and gives a class average of A-! Take with him, he doesnt disappoint.
Sudheer is amazing and very practical! He really knows his stuff and wants all of his students to do well. Projects are fun not stressful.

One of the best professors I've ever had. Very clear when explaining topics, and more than willing to explain further if necessary. Marks very fairly and gives very funny, engaging lectures. Clear expert in his field. In my opinion, doesn't work through enough quantitative examples in class- but don't let this stop you from taking his class.

Awesome!! I seldom will go to Ratemyprofessors to rate an instructor and he is the only one I can not control myself to rate him with the best mark! He is helpful and nice. The course is not hard because he will give you a high mark as long as you do something on all the projects.

He's such an amazing professor. His lectures are clear and applicable to real life business situation. He's really helpful. I had issues with getting the textbook and he helped me thoroughly. one word of advice, find a good group since you have more than 5 group projects.

Great prof, very thorough with his lectures but does like to talk a lot and not have much discussion. Very interesting material, worth going to lectures! Very applicable to the many businesses that are growing these days. Read the textbook, go to lecture for participation marks (15% of your grade), and find a good group to work with!

This was one of my all-time favourite classes! The prof makes the material interesting and practical.  The cases are very hard, but are marked on thought process, not "right answer".  Lots of great discussions in class.  Take this class!!
I feel sad that I didn't take 336 with him
